reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 386/18: PROHIBITION AGAINST THE PURCHASE, SALE AND OTHER DEALINGS WITH EMISSION ALLOWANCES AND CREDITS
reg_info.reg_name_text: PROHIBITION AGAINST THE PURCHASE, SALE AND OTHER DEALINGS WITH EMISSION ALLOWANCES AND CREDITS
reg_info.act_under: Climate Change Mitigation and Low-carbon Economy Act, 2016

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 21 (3) of the Act, no registered participant shall, on and after the day this Regulation comes into force, purchase, sell, trade or otherwise deal with emission allowances and credits.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsection 21 (3) of the Act, no registered participant shall, on and after the day this Regulation comes into force, purchase, sell, trade or otherwise deal with emission allowances and credits.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
